analysis_racial: "Native or advanced Hungarian speaker" while the "advanced" qualification mitigates, specifying a "native" speaker could serve to discourage non-native Hungarians from applying.
text: Company Description. AUTO1 Group is Europes leading car trading platform which connects the automotive industry through technology. We lead business activities in more than 30 European countries and enable dealers can buy seamlessly via our brand AUTO1. com. Job Description. Your new role: Know in detail the sales policy of the Company and the products marketed for the purpose of promotion on the market. Present, promote and sell products in accordance with the Company's standards and policies. Complies with the sales objectives communicated by the Company Management. Support the colleagues in the sales team in collecting specific information, according to the necessities. Has always a positive and polite attitude in the performance of the relationship and the relationship with the clients. Treat properly any customer complaints, promptly informing the Company Management. Your Skills. Negotiation and mediation skills. Positive attitude. Spirit of observation and attention to detail. Ability to adapt to new situations and to work under stress conditions. Native or advanced Hungarian speaker. Our Offer. Real impact. Your work will enable our business success and disrupt the car industry. A nice office just 1 minute far from Pipera metro station. Benefits package  Attractive salary. sales commission. Success story. Your friends and family will be able to google your employer with billion dollar startup club.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::615254c2f42b2004ab1ba3a7::linkedin_ro", "source": "linkedin_ro", "country": "RO", "company": "AUTO1 Group", "position": "BUCHAREST OFFICE - Sales Account Manager-Hungarian Speakers", "notes": "", "original": "Company Description

AUTO1 Group is Europe\u2019s leading car trading platform which connects the automotive industry through technology. We lead business activities in more than 30 European countries and enable dealers can buy seamlessly via our brand AUTO1.com.

Job Description

Your new role:
  • Know in detail the sales policy of the Company and the products marketed for the purpose of promotion on the market;
  • Present, promote and sell products in accordance with the Company's standards and policies;
  • Complies with the sales objectives communicated by the Company Management;
  • Support the colleagues in the sales team in collecting specific information, according to the necessities;
  • Has always a positive and polite attitude in the performance of the relationship and the relationship with the clients;
  • Treat properly any customer complaints, promptly informing the Company Management;

Your Skills
  • Negotiation and mediation skills
  • Positive attitude
  • Spirit of observation and attention to detail
  • Ability to adapt to new situations and to work under stress conditions
  • Native or advanced Hungarian speaker

Our Offer
  • Real impact - Your work will enable our business success and disrupt the car industry
  • A nice office just 1 minute far from Pipera metro station
  • Benefits package \u2013 Attractive salary + sales commission
  • Success story - Your friends and family will be able to google your employer with \u201cbillion dollar startup club\u201d
"}
